games.name: Prioritization Game
games.description: Practice prioritizing product tasks based on urgency and impact. Drag tasks to order them by priority with the most urgent or impactful at the top.

games.name: Feature-Metric Matcher
games.description: Match product features with the metrics they would most directly impact. Test your understanding of how features influence different business and product metrics.

games.name: Stack Challenge
games.description: Match different use cases with the most appropriate tech stack. Test your knowledge of which technologies work best for different product requirements.

games.name: Burnout Meter
games.description: Balance team capacity and business impact in this sprint planning simulation. Learn to manage team burnout while delivering high-impact features.

games.name: PM vs Engineer
games.description: Play a strategic game of Tic Tac Toe representing the classic PM vs Engineer dynamic. Features (X) versus Technical Debt (O)!
